verses.text: The \w preparations|strong="H4633"\w* of the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* in \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and the \w answer|strong="H4617"\w* of the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \add is\add* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 16.1 \ft preparations: or, disposings\f*

All the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add are\add* \w clean|strong="H2134"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w weigheth|strong="H8505"\w* the \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Commit|strong="H1556"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and thy \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*.\f + \fr 16.3 \ft Commit: Heb. Roll\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w made|strong="H6466"\w* all \add things\add* for \w himself|strong="H4617"\w*: yea, even the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Every one \add that is\add* \w proud|strong="H1362"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add though\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add join\add* in \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, he shall not be \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*.\f + \fr 16.5 \ft unpunished: Heb. held innocent\f*

By \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* is \w purged|strong="H3722"\w*: and by the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add men\add* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

When a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w please|strong="H7521"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he maketh even his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* to be at \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with him.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* with \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* than \w great|strong="H7230"\w* \w revenues|strong="H8393"\w* without \w right|strong="H4941"\w*.

A \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w deviseth|strong="H2803"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w directeth|strong="H3559"\w* his \w steps|strong="H6806"\w*.

A divine \w sentence|strong="H7081"\w* \add is\add* in the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w transgresseth|strong="H4603"\w* not in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 16.10 \ft A divine…: Heb. Divination\f*

A \w just|strong="H4941"\w* \w weight|strong="H6425"\w* and \w balance|strong="H3976"\w* \add are\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: all the \w weights|strong="H0068"\w* of the \w bag|strong="H3599"\w* \add are\add* his \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.\f + \fr 16.11 \ft the weights: Heb. the stones\f*

\add It is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* to \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: for the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* is \w established|strong="H3559"\w* by \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w Righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add are\add* the \w delight|strong="H7522"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; and they \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him that \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*.

The \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* of a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add is as\add* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: but a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* will \w pacify|strong="H3722"\w* it.

In the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; and his \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* \add is\add* as a \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w* of the latter \w rain|strong="H4456"\w*.

How much \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is it\add* to \w get|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* than \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*! and to \w get|strong="H7069"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* rather to be \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* than \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*!

The \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \add is\add* to \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: he that \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Pride|strong="H1347"\w* \add goeth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*, and an \w haughty|strong="H1363"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* a \w fall|strong="H3783"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add it is to be\add* of an \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* with the \w lowly|strong="H6035"\w*, than to \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* with the \w proud|strong="H1343"\w*.

He that handleth a \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w wisely|strong="H7919"\w* shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: and whoso \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* he.\f + \fr 16.20 \ft handleth…: or, understandeth a matter\f*

The \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w*: and the \w sweetness|strong="H4986"\w* of the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H3254"\w* \w learning|strong="H3948"\w*.

\w Understanding|strong="H7922"\w* \add is\add* a \w wellspring|strong="H4726"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* unto him that \w hath|strong="H1167"\w* it: but the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* of \w fools|strong="H0191"\w* \add is\add* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.

The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w teacheth|strong="H7919"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w addeth|strong="H3254"\w* \w learning|strong="H3948"\w* to his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 16.23 \ft teacheth: Heb. maketh wise\f*

\w Pleasant|strong="H5278"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \add are as\add* an \w honeycomb|strong="H6688"\w*, \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w* to the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w health|strong="H4832"\w* to the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that seemeth \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, but the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* thereof \add are\add* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5315"\w* that \w laboureth|strong="H6001"\w* \w laboureth|strong="H5998"\w* for himself; for his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w craveth|strong="H0404"\w* it of him.\f + \fr 16.26 \ft He…: Heb. The soul of him that\f*\f + \fr 16.26 \ft craveth…: Heb. boweth unto him\f*

An \w ungodly|strong="H1100"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* diggeth \w up|strong="H3738"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: and in his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add there is\add* as a \w burning|strong="H6867"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 16.27 \ft An…: Heb. A man of Belial\f*

A \w froward|strong="H8419"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w soweth|strong="H7971"\w* \w strife|strong="H4066"\w*: and a \w whisperer|strong="H5372"\w* \w separateth|strong="H6504"\w* chief \w friends|strong="H0441"\w*.\f + \fr 16.28 \ft soweth: Heb. sendeth forth\f*

A \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w enticeth|strong="H6601"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w leadeth|strong="H3212"\w* him into the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

He \w shutteth|strong="H6095"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* froward \w things|strong="H8419"\w*: \w moving|strong="H7169"\w* his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* he \w bringeth|strong="H3615"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* to \w pass|strong="H3615"\w*.

The hoary \w head|strong="H7872"\w* \add is\add* a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*, \add if\add* it be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\add He that is\add* \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*; and he that \w ruleth|strong="H4910"\w* his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* than he that \w taketh|strong="H3920"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

The \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* is \w cast|strong="H2904"\w* into the \w lap|strong="H2436"\w*; but the whole \w disposing|strong="H4941"\w* thereof \add is\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
